name: Analyze CNS Lesion Histology
description: Analyze histological images of CNS lesions to quantify immune cell infiltration and tissue damage

params.name: image_path
params.description: Path to the histological image file (supports common formats like PNG, JPEG, TIFF)

params.name: output_dir
params.description: Directory to save output files and analysis results

params.name: cell_markers_json
params.description: Optional list of cell markers to analyze (JSON array, e.g., '["CD3", "CD8", "GFAP"]', leave blank for default markers)

params.name: pixel_size_um
params.description: Pixel size in micrometers for spatial measurements
